摏字的基本解释

摏
chōng
撞击：“摏其喉以戈，杀之。”

摏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chōng］
［《廣韻》書容切，平鍾，書。］
撞击。

摏字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摏； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?書容切，音舂。衝也，撞也，擣也。【左傳·文十一年】獲長狄僑如，富父終甥摏其喉以戈。亦作舂。

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摏; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 449 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? The volume of the book is cut, and the sound is pounded. Chong Ye, hit Ye, pound Ye. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen eleventh year] Won the Chang Di Qiaoru, the rich father's nephew squatted his throat to fight. Also used as pounding.
